data.title: OPTIMISING IT JOINS CHAMBER AS A GROWTH PARTNER – Exeter Chamber
data.text:
Photo: Todd Gifford CEO of Optimising IT and Richard Marsh CEO of Exeter Chamber

B Corp certified IT and Cyber Security provider, Optimising IT, has joined Exeter Chamber, the region’s leading independent business membership organisation, as its newest Growth Partner.

Established since 2013, Optimising IT opened its first office in Exeter earlier this year in Clockwise at Broadwalk House and is led by managing director Todd Gifford. The company offers managed IT services, IT consultancy, cloud services and cyber security and includes Goodridge, AB Brand and Marketing Agency and Global City Futures among its local client base.

With a team across the region of thirty, Optimising IT has recently become the newest sponsor of the Exeter City Football Club Adam Stansfield stand at St James Park, adding to its sponsorship portfolio which includes Cheltenham FC and now Exeter Chamber.

Chief Executive Todd Gifford said: “We’re an outcomes-focused organisation with trust, simplicity and respect at the core of our approach and client relationships. Our B Corp certification demonstrates these values in action. We knew that Exeter Chamber was an important partnership for us to connect with and support the business community in Exeter, so it was an easy decision for us to become a growth partner. Our values are closely aligned and we look forward to working with the board, team and membership.”

As a Growth Partner, the two organisations will work strategically together to offer members events and information on IT best practise, managing your cyber security and the process and benefits of B Corp certification, an ever-growing movement in the future of business.

Richard Marsh, CEO of Exeter Chamber comments on the new partnership; “This is a really exciting partnership for the Chamber. Optimising IT is at the forefront of IT, in particular cyber security and its fast-paced development. By working together, we can help share vital knowledge and insight across the Exeter business community, staying across trends and challenges to protect, grow and strengthen businesses.“

Optimising IT joins Wollens, Griffin Chartered Accountants, Exeter College, Stagecoach, New Future Ventures, Radio Exe, Reach Publishing Services, Bespa and Cathedral Appointments as Exeter Chamber Growth Partners.
